library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

gen_tab <- read.csv2(file="data/Cichlid_genomes_21.8.25.tsv", sep="\t")

head(gen_tab)

library(dplyr)

gen_1 <- gen_tab %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.character), ~ gsub(" ", "_", .)))

gen_nodup <- gen_1 %>%
  group_by(Organism.Name) %>%
  summarise(median_length = median(Assembly.Stats.Total.Sequence.Length, na.rm = TRUE))
  
gen_nodup_clean <- gen_nodup %>%
  filter(Organism.Name != "Otopharynx_argyrosoma_'red'")

  
  library(ggplot2)

ggplot(gen_nodup_clean, aes(x = median_length / 1e8)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, fill = "steelblue", color = "white") +
  labs(
    x = "Assembly Total Sequence Length (100Mbp)",
    y = "Count",
    title = "Distribution of cichlid genome size"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
